name: mocha-istanbul-ui
description: Run Mocha with Istanbul coverage visually.

scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run build:dev" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/main.js && electron . --instrument "sample-tests/*.test.js""
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build && electron . files --console
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c && cp index.html dist/
scripts.test:ui: concurrently "cross-env NODE_ENV=test MAIN=test/main.js nollup -c" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/main.js && electron . http://localhost:8080/main.js"

author: Paul Sweeney
